channel.title: powershell on My learning and diary

item.title: linux utils equivalent in powershell
item.description: I never thought I will learn to use powershell seriously. Now I joined NTUC, there are many restrictions. Today I started to use linux utils equivalent in powershell. dig: Resolve-DnsName telnet: Test-NetConnection host: Get-Host touch: New-Item cat: Get-Content tail: Get-Content grep: Where-Object or Select-String man: Get-Help References https://mathieubuisson.github.io/powershell-linux-bash/#pwd- -
